nodes.text: A scabbard was a sheath for holding a sword or dagger.

During the Clone Wars, King Katuunko of Toydaria wore the Toydarian ceremonial sword in a scabbard on his belt. Twi'lek Lonay, one of Prince Xizor's Black Sun Vigos during the Galactic Civil War, wore a jeweled dagger in a scabbard, which served as a symbol of his power over the life and death of his subordinates.
